title: Shuaiqi Liu 刘帅齐
text: Hi, I am a PhD student of BioScience and Biomedical Engineering (BSBE) in Hongkong University of Science and Technology (HKUST) Guangzhou campus now. I am interested in CRISPR-Cas13 system and evolotion biology. In addition, i am a super fan of R!!

title: Shuaiqi Liu 刘帅齐
